Who: LEGACY, Tuscon, Perceptor, Talon, Straight Shot
Location: Deep earth caverns not far from the Black Fortress

Even as Tuscon was giving orders seven creatures came walking into the
light, bright luminous optics winking on as they stepped into the
light. They were corrupted twisted looking things, resembling
something like earth insects, but oddly alien at the same time. They
were all a brownish black, although with glints of a strange metallic
silver here and there. They were each about as large as full grown
lion, each creature had ten legs, six insect like 'walking' legs, with
barbed 'knees' that ended with short claws extending from a large and
powerfully built thorax. And like  a praying mantis they had an
extended thorax, a chest like construct from which four others legs
were attached that looked larger and more powerful. Each of these legs
was barbed with hooks along the sides, and with forelegs that ended in
long sharp blades! The abdomen of each creature had a long flexible
stinger, which like a scorpion was poised for striking. They head was
small with two large eyes and several smaller ones. However what may
be of more interest is that instead of the chitinous shell of your
typical creature, their 'shells' were composed of a strange metallic
substance.

"Intruders." they hissed in unison, a strange buzzing noise
accompanying their movements as they quickly moved forward. "They must
be brought to the mistress!"

(TAG)

OOC: Here is a question before we go too far in:

In the past there have been instances where folks have been ignoring
attacks from others. IE: Person A attacks person B, but person B just
poses talking with someone else and then attacks back without posing
the results of the attack from Person A, and they go through the
battle with seemingly no hits or battle damage.

So do you want me to GM the hits/misses/results or do you want to keep
track of that yourselves? I am open either way.

Preston
